verses.verse: ([A Psalm of] Praise, of David.) I will extol <WH7311> Thee, my God, <WH430> O King; <WH4428> And I will bless <WH1288> Thy name <WH8034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
Every <WH3605> day <WH3117> I will bless <WH1288> Thee, And I will praise <WH1984> Thy name <WH8034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
Great <WH1419> is the Lord, <WH3068> and highly <WH3966> to be praised; <WH1984> And His greatness <WH1420> is unsearchable. <WH369> <WH2714>
One generation <WH1755> shall praise <WH9576> Thy works <WH4639> to another, <WH1755> And shall declare <WH5046> Thy mighty <WH1369> acts. <WH1369>
On the glorious <WH9202> splendor <WH1926> of Thy majesty, <WH1935> And on Thy wonderful <WH6381> works, <WH6381> I will meditate. <WH7878>
And men shall speak <WH559> of the power <WH5807> of Thine awesome <WH3372> acts; <WH3372> And I will tell <WH5608> of Thy greatness. <WH1420>
They shall eagerly <WH5042> utter <WH5042> the memory <WH2143> of Thine abundant <WH7227> goodness, <WH2898> And shall shout <WH7442> joyfully <WH7442> of Thy righteousness. <WH6666>
The Lord <WH3068> is gracious <WH2587> and merciful; <WH7349> Slow <WH750> to anger <WH639> and great <WH1419> in lovingkindness. <WH2617>
The Lord <WH3068> is good <WH2896> to all, <WH3605> And His mercies <WH7356> are over <WH5921> all <WH3605> His works. <WH4639>
All <WH3605> Thy works <WH4639> shall give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thee, O Lord, <WH3068> And Thy godly <WH2623> ones <WH2623> shall bless <WH1288> Thee.
They shall speak <WH1696> of the glory <WH9202> of Thy kingdom, <WH4438> And talk <WH1696> of Thy power; <WH1369>
To make <WH3045> known <WH3045> to the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> Thy mighty <WH1369> acts, <WH1369> And the glory <WH9202> of the majesty <WH1926> of Thy kingdom. <WH4438>
Thy kingdom <WH4438> is an everlasting <WH5769> kingdom, <WH4438> And Thy dominion <WH4475> [endures] throughout all <WH3605> generations. <WH1755>
The Lord <WH3068> sustains <WH5564> all <WH3605> who fall, <WH5307> And raises <WH2210> up all <WH3605> who are bowed <WH3721> down. <WH3721>
The eyes <WH5869> of all <WH3605> look <WH7663> to Thee, And Thou dost give <WH5414> them their food <WH400> in due time. <WH6256>
Thou dost open <WH6605> Thy hand, <WH3027> And dost satisfy <WH7646> the desire <WH7522> of every <WH3605> living <WH2416> thing. <WH2416>
The Lord <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662> in all <WH3605> His ways, <WH1870> And kind <WH2623> in all <WH3605> His deeds. <WH4639>
The Lord <WH3068> is near <WH7138> to all <WH3605> who call <WH7121> upon Him, To all <WH3605> who <WH834> call <WH7121> upon Him in truth. <WH571>
He will fulfill <WH6213> the desire <WH7522> of those who fear <WH3372> Him; He will also hear <WH8085> their cry <WH7775> and will save <WH3467> them.
The Lord <WH3068> keeps <WH8104> all <WH3605> who love <WH157> Him; But all <WH3605> the wicked, <WH7563> He will destroy. <WH8045>
My mouth <WH6310> will speak <WH1696> the praise <WH8416> of the Lord; <WH3068> And all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> will bless <WH1288> His holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
